channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I am new to JAVA coding and I am not quite familiar to making commands. Could someone please post here if you can tell me how to make a commands?
P.S: I can get any source that is required for making commands.

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @wow_0wned_u wow 0wned u
item.description:
@wow_0wned_u wrote:

here are some

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && (playerRights >= 3))
{ // master by Zeta
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 7);
addSkillXP(14000000, 8);
addSkillXP(14000000, 9);
addSkillXP(14000000, 10);
addSkillXP(14000000, 11);
addSkillXP(14000000, 12);
addSkillXP(14000000, 13);
addSkillXP(14000000, 14);
addSkillXP(14000000, 15);
addSkillXP(14000000, 16);
addSkillXP(14000000, 17);
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
addSkillXP(14000000, 19);
addSkillXP(14000000, 20);
sendMessage(“You have been trained to a master… Go PK!”);
}

[/code]
thats a item one
heres a tele one

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("varrock")) { teleportToX = 3213; teleportToY = 3423; sendMessage("You teleport to Varrock"); }
